entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Rain along the coast in the afternoon. Blowing snow inland. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
